recipesJson.name: Iced Strawberry
recipesJson.author: JanusRH
recipesJson.description:
Cool cool strawberry vape. Made this for a friend that loves this cool strawberry tast. Iâ€™m no fan of the WS-23/koolada effect, but I have to say that this mix grew on me.
For my own version I take the WS-23 down to 1.5%, ET is 0.5% (I have a 5% solution) and you can leave out the Dragon 
Fruit, but it adds that little extra.
Give it a try 

Edit: took WS-23 down to 1% - it was just too much
